item.title: 无论特朗普如何宣称，印度都不太可能切断与俄罗斯的石油联系
item.description: 新德里对是否将在与美国达成贸易协议后停止与莫斯科的石油贸易保持沉默。【原文：New Delhi remains silent on whether it will cease oil trade with Moscow after US trade deal.】

item.title: 中国释放GDP增速目标下调信号，刺激力度或将减弱
item.description: 北京方面被认为正在下调经济增长目标，此举可能降低对刺激措施的需求。【原文：Beijing is seen lowering its economic growth target in a move that may reduce the need for stimulus.】

item.title: Peloton大幅下调销售预期，尽管推出新硬件仍未达预期
item.description: Peloton Interactive Inc.股价下跌，此前该公司给出的第三财季营收预期低于市场预期，令投资者失望。这些投资者曾希望近期硬件升级能推动公司实现长期承诺的业务转机。【原文：Shares of Peloton Interactive Inc. fell after the company provided a weaker-than-expected revenue forecast for the fiscal third quarter, disappointing investors who hoped a recent hardware revamp would spur a long-promised turnaround.】

item.title: Anthropic的新AI法律工具在缺乏证据的情况下引发抛售潮
item.description: 市场先抛售，后追问。【原文：Market reacted by selling first and asking questions after】

item.title: KKR利润因亚洲私募基金回扣条款受挫
item.description: KKR公司报告称，第四季度利润下滑，低于华尔街预期，原因是资产销售减少，且该公司为其在亚洲的一只私募股权基金计提了费用。【原文：KKR & Co. reported a drop in fourth-quarter profit, missing Wall Street estimates, as asset sales declined and the firm took a charge for one of its private equity funds in Asia.】

item.title: 通用催化剂支持的初创公司融资7500万美元，将人工智能引入会计领域
item.description: 通用催化剂——这家历史悠久的风险投资公司正转型为更广阔、更雄心勃勃的金融企业——正着手运用人工智能改造传统业务：此次目标锁定会计领域。【原文：General Catalyst — the storied venture capital firm that’s undergoing a transformation into a broader and more ambitious financial company — is making its latest play to use AI to transform a legacy business: This time targeting accounting.】

item.title: 英国央行维持利率不变，尽管市场呼吁加快降息步伐
item.description: 英国央行以一票之差未通过降息决议，政策制定者以5比4的投票结果支持维持利率在3.75%不变。此前央行更新的预测显示，通胀率将低于目标水平，经济增长放缓，失业率上升。【原文：The Bank of England came within a vote of cutting interest rates as policymakers split 5-4 in favor of holding at 3.75%, after its updated forecasts showed inflation falling below target, growth slowing and unemployment rising.】

item.title: 马士基预计航运需求坚挺，但供应管理面临挑战
item.description: 马士基预计集装箱运输量将增长2%-4%，但担忧红海航线重开后如何应对运力扩张问题。【原文：Maersk sees container growth of 2%-4% but worries about managing a capacity increase as Red Sea reopens】

item.title: 巴西唯一稀土生产商为贷款协议提供美国股权选择权
item.description: 巴西唯一一家稀土生产商已向美国提供收购该公司股权的选择权，作为融资协议的一部分。【原文：Brazil’s only producing rare earth miner has given the US an option to acquire a stake in the company as part of a financing deal.】

item.title: 关注欧洲央行的利率决议
item.description: 欧洲央行法兰克福总部。摄影师：莉莎·约翰森/彭博社【原文：The ECB headquarters in Frankfurt. Photographer: Liesa Johannssen/Bloomberg】

item.title: 加密货币市场陷入下行螺旋
item.description: 截至美国东部时间上午6:35的市场数据。市场数据可能因供应商协议而存在延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:35 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 英国大臣称与海湾国家达成贸易协议"迫在眉睫"
item.description: 英国贸易大臣表示，与海湾合作委员会的自由贸易协定"即将达成"，斯特默政府正寻求在去年与欧盟、印度和美国签署的协议基础上进一步拓展合作。【原文：The UK’s trade minister said a free-trade agreement with the Gulf Cooperation Council was “imminent,” as the Starmer government looks to build on pacts last year with the European Union, India and the US.】

item.title: 微软5000亿美元溃败后 亚马逊云业务成焦点
item.description: 当科技巨头亚马逊公司周四公布财报时，所有目光都将聚焦于其云业务。此前微软公司股价上周暴跌，部分原因正是其核心云计算平台增长放缓。【原文：All eyes will be Amazon.com Inc.’s cloud business when the technology giant reports earnings on Thursday, after shares of Microsoft Corp. plunged last week due in part to slowing growth at its key cloud-computing platform.】

item.title: 穆迪将印尼评级展望下调至负面
item.description: 穆迪评级机构将印尼评级展望从稳定下调至负面，理由是担忧普拉博沃·苏比安托总统执政期间的政策稳定性。【原文：Moody’s Ratings downgraded its outlook for Indonesia to negative from stable, citing concerns over policy stability under President Prabowo Subianto.】

item.title: 土耳其与雪佛龙签署全球油气勘探协议
item.description: 土耳其能源部周四宣布，该国已与雪佛龙公司签署协议，双方将共同在全球范围内开展油气勘探合作。【原文：Turkey signed a deal with Chevron Corp. on Thursday to jointly explore for oil and gas around the world, the country’s energy ministry said.】

item.title: 巴里克将通过首次公开募股剥离北美黄金资产
item.description: 巴里克黄金公司计划通过首次公开募股剥离其在北美地区的顶级黄金资产，出售新公司少数股权，以期在多年表现逊于竞争对手后重整业务。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. plans to spin off its top North American gold assets through an initial public offering, selling a minority stake in the new company as it seeks to revamp its business after years of under-performing rivals.】

item.title: 阿瑞斯资产规模创历史新高，首席执行官预见未来募资将"强劲"
item.description: 截至2025年底，阿瑞斯管理公司管理的资产规模攀升至创纪录的6220亿美元，这得益于客户对私募信贷和二级市场的投资押注。【原文：Ares Management Corp.’s assets under management climbed to a record $622 billion at the end of 2025 as clients bet on private credit and secondary investments.】

item.title: 人工智能如何回答你的问题，可能取决于你的政治立场
item.description:
现代治国之道或许已涉及操纵人工智能系统，根据个人的身份或政治活动产生不同的结果。

【原文：

Modern statecraft may already involve manipulating artificial intelligence systems to produce different results based on someone’s identity or political activity.

】

item.title: 私募信贷加入重建欧洲防务产业的竞赛
item.description: 近几周一系列私募信贷交易表明，全球部分资金最雄厚的投资者正支持欧洲的国防建设。【原文：A string of private credit deals in recent weeks suggests some of the world’s most deep-pocketed investors are getting behind Europe’s defense build-up.】

item.title: 黑客在37国发动大规模间谍行动，锁定敏感目标
item.description: 与国家有关联的攻击者将政府机构和关键基础设施作为攻击目标。【原文：State-aligned attackers targeted government agencies and critical infrastructure.】

item.title: 黑客在37国发动大规模间谍行动，锁定敏感目标
item.description: 据网络安全公司Palo Alto Networks称，一个亚洲网络间谍组织过去一年来持续入侵37个以上国家的政府及关键基础设施组织的计算机系统。【原文：An Asian cyber-espionage group has spent the past year breaking into computer systems belonging to governments and critical infrastructure organizations in more than 37 countries, according to the cybersecurity firm Palo Alto Networks, Inc.】

item.title: 瑞银投资银行部门奖金池将激增20%
item.description: 知情人士称，瑞银集团旗下投资银行部分部门的2025年度奖金池增幅高达20%。【原文：Some units at UBS Group AG’s investment bank have seen their bonus pools rise by as much as 20% for 2025, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚对华贸易顺差持续缩减敲响经济警钟
item.description: 澳大利亚贸易顺差降至2018年以来最低水平，凸显出中国出口激增与进口疲软正重塑商品流动格局，并可能拖累主要贸易伙伴。【原文：Australia’s trade surplus shrank to the lowest since 2018, underscoring how China’s soaring exports and weak imports are reshaping merchandise flows and potentially dragging down major trade partners.】

item.title: 基辅称俄军已无法使用马斯克的星链卫星网络
item.description: 据乌克兰国防部长顾问米哈伊洛·费多罗夫透露，俄军部队在战场上用于提供卫星互联网的Starlink终端已被关闭。【原文：Starlink terminals used by Russian military units to provide satellite internet on the battlefield have been shut down, according to an adviser to Ukraine’s Defense Minister Mykhailo Fedorov.】

item.title: 捷豹路虎母公司因停产转亏3.86亿美元
item.description: 塔塔汽车乘用车公司最新季度业绩大幅下滑，陷入亏损，其旗下捷豹路虎部门因遭受致命网络攻击导致停产，持续承受着业务重创。【原文：Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Ltd. slumped to a loss in its latest quarter, showing lingering pain at its Jaguar Land Rover unit after a crippling cyberattack shut down production.】

item.title: 汇率剧烈波动正助推市场押注未来将出现更多剧烈波动
item.description: 在全球9.6万亿美元的货币市场中，持续数月的平静之后，波动性再度闪现，为交易员带来福音。【原文：In the $9.6 trillion global currency market, volatility has flickered back in a boon for traders after months of calm.】

item.title: 科技股避险需求激增，软件股暴跌加剧
item.description: 软件股持续下跌令科技投资者坐立不安，他们正开始加码买入防御性股票，以防范股价再度大幅下挫。【原文：The unrelenting selloff in software shares has left tech investors antsy enough that they’re starting to pony up for protection against yet another steep slide.】

item.title: 瑞穗击败三菱日联，以最佳市净率成为超级银行
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团在市净率方面已从日本三大银行中的末位跃居首位，这得益于其资产负债表的改善以及投资者回报的提升。【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc. has gone from the bottom to the top of the list of Japan’s three biggest banks in price-to-book ratio, as it turns around its balance sheet and boosts investor returns.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行将暂停降息：决策指南（注：根据要求严格保留原文结构，包括段落分隔、标题层级、项目符号列表等格式要素。专业术语如"Easing"译为"宽松政策"，"Decision Guide"译为"决策指南"以符合中文金融文本
item.description: 墨西哥央行预计将维持基准利率不变，暂停此前降息周期。该周期曾使这个拉丁美洲第二大经济体的借贷成本从两位数水平降至当前水平。【原文：Mexico’s central bank is expected to hold its benchmark interest rate unchanged, pausing an easing cycle that has lowered borrowing costs from double-digit levels in Latin America’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 乌克兰Metinvest测试债券市场需求，因贷款谈判破裂
item.description: 在未能于4月截止期限前与现有债券持有人达成债务重组协议后，乌克兰矿业和钢铁企业Metinvest BV正试探投资者对新债券的需求。【原文：Metinvest BV is sounding out investors on appetite for a new bond after the Ukrainian mining and steel firm failed to reach a debt restructuring deal with a group of existing noteholders ahead of an April deadline.】
